---
title: Spicy Chicken and Sweet Potato
description: Spicy chicken and sweet potato
categories: [Healthy, Lunch, Dinner]
cooktime: 45 minutes
date: 2024-01-14
---

## Ingredients

* 126 g chicken breast
* 1 tsp cajun seasoning
* 2 tsp extra virgin olive oil
* 250 g sweet potato (cubed)
* 175g broccoli

## Directions

1. Preheat the oven to 425ºF (218ºC). Toss the cubed chicken pieces with thes pices. Stir everything to combine, and store in the fridge for 15 minutes while you prep the other ingredients.
2. Prepare a sheet pan with aluminum foil and spray with non-stick spray. Arrange the vegetables over top. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle a pinchof salt over top.
3. Arrange a separate sheet pan like you did for the vegetables, except placethe chicken on top of it.
4. Bake all ingredients for 12-15 minutes. Remove the broccoli and chicken. Stirsweet potatoes and roast for another 15 minutes or so.
